title: The Magnetic Fields - 69 Love Songs (1999) (All 3 Volumes)
description:
69 Love Songs is a three-volume concept album by The Magnetic Fields. As its title indicates, the album is composed of 69 love songs, all written by Magnetic Fields frontman Stephin Merritt. The album was released in 1999 in the United States.
